attributes.action: Animal abuse - the law to be a tougher to stop it happening
attributes.additional_details:
Dog bait 
Stolen dogs
Abuse of animals
attributes.background:
The law needs to be there to protect defenceless animals. If these people are capable to these things to animals, they can do to children too.
Currently the law isn't a deterrent and holds nothing to stop these crimes from happening which are sickening.
